title: Helping Your Child Embrace God's Joy
itunes:author: Guest: Courtney DeFeo
itunes:summary: It's not easy to teach young children the difference between happiness and joy. John and Danny discuss how to help your kids embrace biblical virtues, including joy. Receive the book In This House, We Will Giggle with your gift of any amount!
description: It's not easy to teach young children the difference between happiness and joy. John and Danny discuss how to help your kids embrace biblical virtues, including joy. Receive the book In This House, We Will Giggle with your gift of any amount!
